name: Super Mario - Wart's Turn-Based Revenge
description:
Control Mario, Peach, Toad and the Green one. Find advantageous cover and attack the enemies! Stop on a plant to automatically toss it an an enemy for extra damage.

Fight through 23 levels with 5 boss fights!  Completing all levels takes 2-3 hours.

3 different level completion modes are available: Defeat All, Reach Area, and Defeat Boss.

Saving is only supported in the downloadable version.

Controls:

KeyboardFunction W, A, S, DMove the camera Q, ERotate the camera 1-3Quick select Move, Shoot, Heal TEnd Turn Mouse Left ClickSelect tiles or targets EscapePause Backspace(Web Only) Pause

I do not claim ownership of any characters, music tracks, or sound effects. All Assets are Copyright of Nintendo.
Art assets came from Super Mario 2 for the SNES and the music comes from both Super Mario 2 and Mario 3.
